org.tigris.noodle
Interface NoodleResponseFilter

All Superinterfaces:
NoodleFilter
All Known Implementing Classes:
CheckForRedirect, CopyCookies, HandleContentType
public interface NoodleResponseFilter
extends NoodleFilter

Those who want to Noodle can Noodle with NoodleFilters.

Author:
Jon S. Stevens, Daniel Rall, Leonard Richardson

Field Summary
static int KILL_ALL_FILTERS
          Filter status indicating that this filter has determined that no more filtering needs to be done--there was a redirect or something.
static int KILL_THIS_FILTER
          Filter status indicating that this filter is done processing and need no longer be called.
static int MAINTAIN_THIS_FILTER
          Filter status indicating that this filter should be called on the next block.
 
Method Summary
 int filter(NoodleData noodleData, ResponseBlock block)
          Hook called for a filter on every block of proxied data until there is no block of proxied data, or until this filter returns a filter status code other than MANTAIN_THIS_FILTER.
 

Field Detail

public static final int MAINTAIN_THIS_FILTER
Filter status indicating that this filter should be called on the next block.

public static final int KILL_THIS_FILTER
Filter status indicating that this filter is done processing and need no longer be called.

KILL_ALL_FILTERS

public static final int KILL_ALL_FILTERS
Filter status indicating that this filter has determined that no more filtering needs to be done--there was a redirect or something.
Method Detail

filter

public int filter(NoodleData noodleData,
                  ResponseBlock block)
           throws java.lang.Exception
Hook called for a filter on every block of proxied data until there is no block of proxied data, or until this filter returns a filter status code other than MANTAIN_THIS_FILTER.
Parameters:
noodleData - Contains miscellaneous storage and information about the request; you can also use this to mantain filter state.
responseBlock - The current response block to be filtered.
Returns:
a status code; one of the four *FILTER* constants in this class.
